This is Loop, a full-stack quiz application built for the Enrolla coding challenge.

Project name: Loop
Tagline: "Stay in the loop"
Concept: The name reflects programming loops (iterating through questions) and continuous learning cycles

Tech stack:
- Backend: Hono on Cloudflare Workers
- Frontend: Next.js 15 App Router
- Styling: TailwindCSS with shadcn/ui
- Font: Montserrat (Google Fonts)
- State: React useReducer (no external state libraries)

All detailed specifications are in the Loop Requirements/ folder at project root.

Key constraints:
- No external state management libraries (Zustand, Redux, etc.)
- No localStorage or sessionStorage
- No database or authentication
- Use warm cream color palette (#FFFBED base)
- Use Montserrat font family only
- Follow design system in Loop Requirements/DESIGN_SYSTEM.md

When suggesting code, always reference Loop Requirements/ folder for design patterns, colors, and component structure.
